security.rate_limit_default.description: Default rate limit for all HTTP endpoints. Multiple limits can be separated by semicolons (e.g., '5000 per hour;50000 per day'). Format: 'N per hour/minute/day'.
security.rate_limit_default.name: Default Rate Limit

security.rate_limit_login.description: Rate limit for login attempts to prevent brute force attacks (e.g., '5 per 15 minutes').
security.rate_limit_login.name: Login Rate Limit

security.rate_limit_registration.description: Rate limit for registration attempts to prevent spam (e.g., '3 per hour').
security.rate_limit_registration.name: Registration Rate Limit

security.session_remember_me_days.description: Number of days a 'Remember Me' session remains valid before requiring re-login.
security.session_remember_me_days.name: Remember Me Duration (Days)

security.session_timeout_hours.description: Session timeout in hours for sessions without 'Remember Me' checked. Only applies to internal session validation (browser sessions expire on close).
security.session_timeout_hours.name: Session Timeout (Hours)
